data.description: Concurrent transactions fail with 'No such file or directory' when multiple processes try to update _version.tmp simultaneously. Add ProcessLock around version file operations. This will enable the 7 skipped concurrent tests in test_got_index_concurrent.py and test_got_index_integration.py.

properties.retrospective: Fixed by adding threading.Lock to _save_version(). fcntl.flock only provides process-level locking, not thread-level locking. Added _version_thread_lock for intra-process safety while keeping ProcessLock for inter-process safety. Enabled 6 concurrent tests; 1 remains skipped due to separate indexer race condition.

data.title: Fix VersionedStore race condition in _version.tmp
